number_courses.description: The number of courses a student is taking

time_study.description: The amount of time a student spends studying, in hours

Marks.description: The marks obtained by the student

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in predicting student performance.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the number of courses and study time of the student, please predict the Marks obtained by the student.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in predicting course load.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the study time and Marks obtained by the student, please predict the number of courses the student is taking.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted number of courses is __.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in predicting study time.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the number of courses and Marks obtained by the student, please predict the study time of the student.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted study time is __ hours.
